授業方法:
In principle, this class will be face-to-face; however, all class materials, tasks, and explanations will be posted in a Google Classroom dedicated to this class.

Depending on enrollment and the evolving COVID-19 situation, course format may combine lectures, tasks, pair/group work, and individual/group presentations to enhance students’ listening skills. Throughout the course, students will also be working on other skills, such as reading, speaking and writing. You should have a stable wifi or internet connection at home to complete all out-of-class assignments.

第3回: - ways to listen (comprehension approach, bottom-up activities, prediction)
第4回: - ways to listen (metacognitive strategies, transfer to other strategies, teacher modeling)
第7回: - listening logs: three activities while listening
第10回: - introduction to English varieties (e.g. US vs. UK English)
第11回: - listening and note taking during academic lectures; English varieties in film
第12回: - listening and note taking during academic lectures; English varieties in film
第13回: - listening log review: pre- during- and post-activities
